# Tarek Fahmy

Tarek Fahmy is a consultant focused on service design, product and service innovation, AI strategy, digital transformation, and data-informed innovation.

## Priority regions
- Finland
- Sweden
- Norway
- Denmark
- UAE (United Arab Emirates)
- Saudi Arabia
- Egypt
- Qatar
- Oman

## Regional positioning phrases
- Service Design consultant in Finland, Nordics, and MENA
- AI strategy and transformation across Nordics and MENA
